General.Name: Haima Automobile Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Haima Automobile Co.,Ltd researches, develops, designs, manufactures, sells, and financial services of automobiles and powertrains in China. Its product portfolio includes cars, SUVs, MPVs, new energy, and electric vehicles. The company also offers stamping parts, welding parts, injection molding parts, and battery PAKE, as well as after-sales services. It also exports its products to Egypt, Chile, the Philippines, Vietnam, and internationally. The company was formerly known as Haima Automobile Group Co.,Ltd. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Haikou, China.

6.Name: Jiang  Zhichun
6.Title: Gen. Mang. of HAIMA Automobile Sales
